page.title: 04SOCIAL CONCERN
page.content: A LOCAL COUNCIL WAS ELECTED TO REPRESENT THE INTERESTS OF SMALL COMMUNITIES,IN OUR CASE, STRATHMARTINE,BRIDGEFOOT, AND ITS IMMEDIATE ENVIRONS AS FAR UP AS HARESTANE ROAD AND OUT AS FAR AS BALMUIR,WINTONFARM,FALLOWS,AND ROSEMILL .ELSEWHERE IT MIGHT BE A HOUSING ESTATE OR EVEN PART OF AN ESTATE. THE COUNCIL HAS NO STATUTORY POWERS OF ANY KIND . IT IS SIMPLY A BODY WHICH WILL REPRESENT THE VIEWS OF THE COMMUNITY ON A WHOLE RANGE OF ISSUES AND TOPICS .SOMETIMES IT TENDS TO BE A COMPLAINTS HANDLING BODY .THE COUNCIL IS MADE UP OF 9 COUNCILLORS INCLUDING CHAIRMAN MR W.R. GARVIE. SECRETARY MR B. MILLAR. TREASURER MRS E. CATHCART.
